title: UTakke bandevu
sahitya:
Utakke bandevu nAvu nimma Ta pATava biTTu aDuge mADamma


caraNam 1    kattaliTTAvamma kaNNu bAyi bhakti barutalide kaikAlu jammu 
hottu hOgisa bEDavamma ondu tuttAdaru ittu salahu nammamma
    caraNam 2    oDaloLage usirilla ondu kSaNavAdare jIva nilluvudilla 
maDidhare dOSa taTTuvudu ondu hiDi akkiyindale kIrti bAhOdu
    caraNam 3    honnu rAsiya tandu sariye kOTi kannikeyara tandu dhAreyanereye 
anna dAnakkinnu sariye prasanna purandara viTTala doreye
